speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0057/2007 ) by Joel Hasse Ferreira, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on social services of general interest in the European Union ( 2006/2134(INI) .
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0057/2007 ) by Joel Hasse Ferreira, on behalf of the Committee on Employment and Social Affairs, on social services of general interest in the European Union ( 2006/2134(INI) .
